translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺としては、黒部殿には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for me, I want Lord Kurobe to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王として君臨し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...reign as the Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数の妖怪を率いて欲しいと思ってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading a large number of youkai."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　妖怪王の座を譲る気なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Are you planning to give up the throne of Youkai King?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。妖怪は今、一致団結して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. The youkai must now unite as one,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と戦わねばならぬ時。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fight against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果が同じなら過程は問わん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the result is the same, I don't care about the process."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に黒部殿には妖怪王の位をお返しすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have already suggested to Lord Kurobe that I would return the position of Youkai King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらから提言した」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This was my proposal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒部はなんて？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did Kurobe say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部との会話を思い返し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recalling the conversation with Kurobe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心情をおもんぱかっているのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: perhaps considering his feelings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗は物憂げに目を伏せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune lowered his eyes dolefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今の黒部殿は何にも興味を示されない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Kurobe currently shows no interest in anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪王などという立場も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Positions like Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のありようも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or the state of the world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼にとって大事なものはただ一つ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is only one thing that is important to him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今はなき、主……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His master, who is now gone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 藤原石丸」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fujiwara Ishimaru."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒部殿はかの主を失った傷が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Kurobe's wound from losing that master

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ癒えないでいるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has yet to heal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが今のJAPANの簡単な状況だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the simple current situation of JAPAN."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、これからどうする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, what will you do from now on?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、妖怪軍が半分に割れたと聞いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, when I heard the youkai army split in half,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は面倒なことになったと思ったが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was going to be troublesome at first...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、簡単ではないか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, isn't it simple!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「主を失ってショックだってんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he's shattered from losing his master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が新しい主になればいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I should just become his new master!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「藤原なんちゃらだか知らんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know what Fujiwara-whatever,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな奴よりイカしてる俺が主になれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if I, who's way cooler than that guy, become the master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつも元気はつらつ言うこと聞くってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he'll be lively and obedient."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、今回は話が分かりやすくていいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, this time the story is easy to understand and good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「主になると簡単に言うが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You say it's easy to become the master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする気だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but what do you plan to do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなもん、俺様が出向いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something like that, I'll just go myself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぺいーんとやっつければいいではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and knock him down in a snap."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後は向こうから下僕にして下さーいと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, he'll surely come saying, 'Please make me your servant!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってくるに決まってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's bound to happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、この男は……もう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, this man is... already..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あはは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ahaha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな簡単に主と認めて下さるかどうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whether he'll so easily acknowledge you as master is another matter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、その……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王黒部の強さは折り紙付きと聞きます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard that the strength of Youkai King Kurobe is undisputed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王と呼ばれるに足るお強さ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is strong enough to be called the first Youkai King!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and knock him down in a snap."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後は向こうから下僕にして下さーいと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, he'll surely come saying, 'Please make me your servant!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってくるに決まってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's bound to happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、この男は……もう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, this man is... already..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あはは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ahaha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな簡単に主と認めて下さるかどうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whether he'll so easily acknowledge you as master is another matter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、その……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王黒部の強さは折り紙付きと聞きます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard that the strength of Youkai King Kurobe is undisputed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王と呼ばれるに足るお強さ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is strong enough to be called the first Youkai King!"
